body:
Hey guys jsut decided to make this quick video on MLG block placing. It was quite fun making it and I really enjoy MLG block placing in Nebula! Anyways have fun watching the video!

Video Link:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GzD5YFG1gX0&feature=youtu.be

replies.body: How do you do the wall running technique so well :o
replies.body_tagged: How do you do the wall running technique so well :o

replies.body: Its quite east you just have to find that perfect angle and then hold down right click. Be careful when doing the wall running technique because of the block lag. If you're careful you should be fine :P
replies.body_tagged: Its quite east you just have to find that perfect angle and then hold down right click. Be careful when doing the wall running technique because of the block lag. If you're careful you should be fine :P

replies.body: How to mlg block place: place a block on the wall and jump on it.

replies.body: I mainly use the standard and wallrun. I learned the standard mayself and the wallrun on ocn when a rusher was settin tnt all over the ice pillar objective and actually not falling.
